title: Is Keytweaks bannable?
body: its my understanding that it is very easy to be banned by an automated punishment system that isnt capable of understanding context. I also understand its bannable to use outside programs while playing this game? I just simply want to unbind my enter key so the chat box never shows up and cant be opened even during fights. I'm not used to playing games rated G that involve death and blood but just want ot make sure that a keybinding program wont get me banned.

replies.body:
The game client cannot even detect simple macros or rebinds.. You could even just rebind it in the game client.

Also resizing the UI is very important, as it covers so much of the screen by default.

I am not sure what game you mean, since league is rated T (G is not even a videogame rating), and has pretty mild/cartoon violence.

So how do you get an A rating from a game doesn't allow curse words via a chat filter regardless of context and permanently removing accounts where people use T language?

i use autohotkey for the same thing. it wont get you banned as long as you arent macroing skillshots or using it to be able to press multiple keys simultaneously with it. it's on the same premise as razer synapse

I dunno what Keytweaks is, but if what it does is simply stop the Enter key from sending a signal to the computer, it should be perfectly fine.

In any case, you should be able to unbind the key within the game settings. Boot up a custom game and look for it.

https://i.imgur.com/1HvNiEO.png?noredirect
Yeah its impossible to unbind the enter key anywhere but via a 3rd party keyboard tool.
I believe I've checked before, and unbinding or rebinding the enter key for chat is one of the few things that you can't do. Doesn't make sense if you ask me.
For those that dont know, keytweak just lets you unbind keys directly from your keyboard or re-map them.
